fields.description: As a cloud administrator I would like federated server certificates to be available to my ELB so I can use server certificates across my federated clouds.

comments.body: Use of server certificates is now supported between federated regions. A test for server certificate use with federated regions is attached along with a basic test for ELB SSL (in case useful)
